member.name: T:CnabApi.Controllers.TransactionsController
member.summary: API controller for managing CNAB file uploads and transaction queries.

member.summary: API controller for managing CNAB file uploads and transaction queries.

member.name: M:CnabApi.Controllers.TransactionsController.UploadCnabFile(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.IFormFile,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Uploads a CNAB file, parses transactions, and stores them in the database.
member.returns: Success message with transaction count or error details.

member.name: M:CnabApi.Controllers.TransactionsController.GetTransactionsByCpf(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Retrieves all transactions for a specific CPF ordered by date (most recent first).
member.returns: List of transactions for the specified CPF.

member.name: M:CnabApi.Controllers.TransactionsController.GetBalance(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Calculates and returns the total balance for a specific CPF.
member.param: The CPF to calculate balance for.
member.returns: Object containing the total balance value for that CPF.

member.name: M:CnabApi.Controllers.TransactionsController.ClearData(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Clears all transactions and stores from the database. WARNING: This operation cannot be undone.

member.summary: Global exception handling middleware that catches all unhandled exceptions and returns standardized error responses.

member.name: T:CnabApi.Models.Transaction
member.summary: Represents a parsed CNAB transaction record.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.Id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the transaction record.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.BankCode
member.summary: Bank code (4 characters).

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.Cpf
member.summary: Customer CPF (11 characters).

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.NatureCode
member.summary: Nature code that identifies transaction type (12 characters - Card). Determines if transaction is debit or credit.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.Amount
member.summary: Transaction amount in the original currency.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.Card
member.summary: Card number or identifier (12 characters).

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.StoreOwner
member.summary: Store owner name (14 characters).

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.StoreName
member.summary: Store name (18 characters).

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.TransactionDate
member.summary: Date when the transaction occurred.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.TransactionTime
member.summary: Time when the transaction occurred.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.CreatedAt
member.summary: Timestamp when the record was created in the system.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.TransactionDescription
member.summary: Human-readable description of the transaction based on nature code.

member.name: P:CnabApi.Models.Transaction.SignedAmount
member.summary: Signed amount (positive for income, negative for expense). Used for balance calculations.

member.name: T:CnabApi.Services.CnabParserService
member.summary: Implementation of CNAB parser service. Handles parsing of CNAB format files with 8-field transaction records.

member.name: M:CnabApi.Services.CnabParserService.ParseCnabFile(System.String)
member.summary: Parses CNAB file content and extracts transaction data. Expected format: 8 fixed-width fields per transaction line.

member.remarks: Initializes the CNAB upload service with required dependencies.

member.summary: Processes a complete CNAB file upload workflow.

member.summary: Service responsible for parsing CNAB file format and extracting transaction data.

member.summary: Parses CNAB file content and extracts transaction data.

member.name: T:CnabApi.Services.ICnabUploadService
member.summary: Service responsible for orchestrating the complete CNAB file upload workflow. Handles file reading, parsing, and storing transactions in a single operation.

member.returns: Result containing the count of imported transactions or error message.

member.returns: Result containing the file content as string or error message.
